summary.Summary:
Software Engineer with more than 5 years of developing production software. Started with low level
 optimization at Intel and dreams/ideas about changing the world during Imagine Cup, having fun
 with Computer Vision and 3D reconstruction research at university. Then moved to US to improve
 Bing search engine and fell in love with big data analysis and large scale systems, which are used by
 millions every day.
